thread.title: Spurs have the most valuable team in the Premier League, Chelsea 3rd [CIES]
thread.title_full: Spurs have the most valuable team in the Premier League, Chelsea 3rd [CIES]

author: Ben Green
title: Spurs have the most valuable team in the Premier League, Chelsea 3rd [CIES]
text:
Spurs have the most valuable team in the Premier League, Chelsea 3rd [CIES] By Ben Green   Spurs in first, Manchester United second 
On Monday, the CIES Football Observatory published their list of the 100 most valuable footballers on the planet . 
Using this date, the CIES Football Observatory have crunched some numbers and worked out that Tottenham have the most valuable team in the Premier League. 
This should have been expected since CIES Football Observatory had two Tottenham stars in their most valuable top 10: Harry Kane and Dele Alli. 
Manchester United have the most expensive squad of all time but trail Spurs. Presumably the young nature of Tottenhamâ€™s squad means they pip their Premier League rivals. Chelsea in 3rd 
Chelsea may be in first in the Premier League but come third in this Premier League table. 
The top six in the Premier League make up the top six in the table below. 
It seems fair to say that if Mesut Ozil and Alexis Sanchez signed new contracts at Arsenal, the value of the Gunners squad could be improved considerably. 
Other notes of interest, are how poorly Leicester are doing since they have the 7th most valuable squad in the Premier League. 
And, well played Burnley, who look like avoiding relegation with the least valuable squad in the Premier League. Loading tags...
